profileViewHtml_private_key_password: Enter your private key and new password to store your key in secure storage and access your account
profileViewHtml_enter_mnemonic: Enter your mnemonic and new password to store your key in secure storage and access your account

profileViewHtml_datadir_alert2: You can restart your wallet now

profileJS_addPeers_default_list: Default list of remote nodes loaded
profileJS_addPeers_no_manual: No manual enodes provided. Loading default remote Node list

profileJS_createNewAccount_password_matc: Password does not match the confirm password
profileJS_createKeyFromPrivateKeyAction_: Using same password as private key is a bad idea
profileJS_createKeyFromMnemonicAction_64:
We can't use password longer more than 64 bytes, due bug in scrypt-js
In case you want more stronger password, consider using 
<Create Account> instead of <Create Mnemonic Account>
You can find full description here:
 https://github.com/ricmoo/scrypt-js/issues/11
profileJS_createNewMnemonicAccount_body: Please save the phrase (mnemonic) in the safe place in order to retrieve your account in case of any failure

profileJS_verifyMsgAction_incorrect deta:
